title: Boar's Head Brown Sugar and Spice Ham Glaze
features: This glaze is all natural, gluten free, milk free, no msg added, and no caramel color added.
Coat ham with glaze and tint with aluminum foil. Heat at 325°F, 15 minutes per pound. 15 minutes before it finishes, coat with additional glaze. Bake uncovered at 425°F an additional 15 minutes.
description: Boar's Head Brown Sugar and Spice Ham Glaze is described as a "tasty blend of vibrant mustard, brown sugar, sweet pineapple juice, and carefully selected spices, this flavorful glaze is ready to spread for a show-stopping meal" and is "the perfect balance of sweet and savory."
details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "5.28 x 3.98 x 2.95 inches; 11 Ounces", "UPC": "740614360564"}
